One of the most <adjective> characters in fiction is named "Tarzan of the <noun>". Tarzan was raised by a/an <noun> and lives in the <adjective> jungle in the heart of darkest <noun>. He spends most of his time eating <noun> and swinging from tree to <noun>. whenever he gets angry, he beats on his chest and says, " noun!" This is his war cry. Tarzan always dresses in <adjective> shorts made from the skin of a/an <noun> and his friend is a/an <adjective> chimpanzee named Cheetah. He is supposed to be able to speak to elephants and <noun>. in the movies, Tarzan is played by <noun>.
